body:
Hello, this is going to be my "Defense Posts", where I'll be showing you people out there some of the most effective ways of defending! ***Any Admin please give me map downloads of at least 2-3 maps that are still active! This would be gladly appreciated! So here is the first Defense (Not a map on the server, just a First time defence with a 19x19 area)

A 19x19  Void defense by: vsplesk101 & Overcast! Please read the signs in the Photo album for understanding of this defense! :
http://imgur.com/a/t4g7k

  More coming soon...

replies.body: I can think a bunch of ways to make this better, try putting crafting tables behind the buttons in the wall. And instead of buttons in the obby, put trapdoors. Hope this helps.
replies.body_tagged: I can think a bunch of ways to make this better, try putting crafting tables behind the buttons in the wall. And instead of buttons in the obby, put trapdoors. Hope this helps.

replies.body:
Trap doors? why? buttons are harder to aim at, I agree with the crafting tables but... I dont see the trap doors to be in them :P  @cedd2701
*EDIT:

Oh on the objective?... Ye this server doesnt have many rushers, Cause when you jump on top of it its easy to hit the Trapdoor and blocks yourself in... so i use buttons cause its easier and i rlly dont see a diffirence :P. I think trap doors makes it worse (My opinion) :P

replies.body: This is a horrible technique. Not on all maps U can do this. Some maps don't have wood. Others are too thick to make a pit. There is even bedrock in most maps! Ballzis technique is better. He is willing to hand train then on different maps. Using a picture is horrible. If u are going to do this ask for peoples skype and go hand train then to actually get different defenses on each map.

@SpicyTunaRoll9 Thank you! I appreciate that you are not as harsh :). YES PEOPLE I know this isnt the BEST defense! Its a Basic 19x19 void defense, I will add more, gosh! Just let me Look at some maps and measure how much they can be improved! 

-Thank you!
